Graduates of Hendricks County High Schools (1923-1962)

Index Â© Meredith Thompson

This is an index to the graduates of all of the high schools in Hendricks County for the years 1923-1962, as published annually in various Hendricks County newspapers.

NOTES:

The lists that were published in the newspapers denoted students who were eligible to graduate--it does not mean that the student actually graduated that year. You should always check yearbooks and school records for more information.

For a full listing of the newspapers used to compile this index, please see this PDF.
